humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the patient has no metastatic carcinoma in the sentinel lymph node (pNO sn (0/1)) which means that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma (New Rule 11). Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The pathology report indicates that the tumor classification is pNO, which corresponds to no regional lymph node involvement. Therefore, the N stage for this patient's cancer is N0.
